II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2018'12'21
863II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2018'08'31 863
wxl 2"103 - 2018 foieïn¾ ui 21 jeks isl=rdod - 2018'12'21
^rcfha n,hmsg m%isoaO lrk ,§&
II fldgi – wêlrK
 msgqj  
iïu; jQ mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha oekaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha oekaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï ... 864
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
863-B 081478— 353 (2018/12)
D 1 -
   msgqj 
jia;= Nx.;aj kvq ms<sn| oekaùï ... ... ... —
msial,a ud¾I,ajrekaf.a m;a lsÍï ... ... ... —
msial,a úlsKSu ... ... ...  873
nQo,a kvq ms<sn| oekaùï ... ... ... ... —
kS;s wOHdmk iNdfõ oekaùï ... ... ... —

úúO oekaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h 
  fuu .eiÜ m;%h www. documents.gov. lk fjí wvúfhka nd.; l< yel' 
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk oekaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs 
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd Èkhka iy fõ,djka 
ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika 
lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a 
ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu 
i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< 
jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr ^tkï" 2019 ckjdß ui 11 jeks Èk m<lrk 
.eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2018 foieïn¾ ui 28 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr& ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
    2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
   zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m<l< hq;= njg 
hï mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh 
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜
 .x.dks ,shkf.a"
 rcfha uqøKd,hdêm;s'
2018 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk"
fld<U 08"
rcfha uqøK fomd¾;fïka;=fõ § h'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2018'12'21
864  
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - kqjrt<sh
ld,h bl=;a jQ kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
kqjrt<sh ufyia;%d;a wêlrKfha ±kg wjqreÿ mylg ^5& fmr wjika ù we;s kvq lghq;= j, my; Wmf,aLkfha i|yka 
kvq jd¾;d udi 03 ^2019'03'21& blau jQ miq fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug iQÞkï lr we;'
   fuu kvqj,g wÞ, hï md¾Yjlrefjl=g ;udg wjYH kvqfõ fyda kvqj, iïmQ¾K iy;sl msgm;la fyda hï 
fldgil msgm;la f.dkq lr we;s ,shú,a,la ,nd .ekSug wjYH fõ kï tA i|yd b,a,Sula udi ;=kla ^2019'03'21& blauùug 
fmr fuu wêlrKfha frðiag%d¾jßh fj; bÈßm;a l< hq;= hq;=h'
   kshñ; Èkg fmr tjeks b,a,Sula bÈßm;a lsÍug fkdyels jqjfyd;a by; Wmf,aLkfha olajd we;s ish¨u kvq 
jd¾;d  udi 03la ^2019'03'21& blau jQ miq fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajkq ,efí'
   úkdY lsÍug kshñ; kvq jd¾;d my; olafõ'
 mfudao chfialr"
 ufyia;%d;a - kqjrt<sh'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2018'12'21
874  
fldgig W;=ßka ( n,h,;a udkl ã' fÊ' o is,ajd úiska 1983'05'25 jeks Èk ilia lrk ,o wxl 1632 ork msUqfrys i`oyka 
A 1 ork fldgiska o" kef.kysrg ( mdfrka o" ol=Kg ( Y ork fldgiska o" niakdysrg (  n,h,;a udkl úiska 2001'05'15 
jeks Èk ilia lr we;s wxl 14$2001 ork msUqfrys i`oyka wxl 1ka o" udhsï jQ msUqrem;a wxl 82$2005 ork msUqrg wkqj
